profile:
We service Vaughan, Richmond Hill, Markham, Newmarket, Bradford, Aurora, North York, Scarborough, Pickering, Ajax, Whitby, Oshawa, Bowmanville, Courtice, Mississauga, Etobicoke and Brampton.

Locally owned, we specialize in all major and minor home repairs. Our uniformed techs are bonded, fully insured and our work is guaranteed. Let us help with that growing "to do" list. Call today!

Handyman Services, Bathroom & Kitchen - Fixtures and Accessories, Fences & Gates, Gutters and Eaves-troughs, Moldings / Moudings, Dry Wall Contractors, Tile and Grout Cleaning, Windows & Doors, Paint & Wallpaper Contractors.
service_area: Richmond Hill, Vaughan, Markham, North York, Scarborough, Stouffville, Pickering, Brampton, Uxbridge, Maple, Oshawa, Whitby, Thornhill, Woodbridge, Concord and Kleinburg.
services: Caulking, Cabinetry/Counters, Drywall/Plaster repair, Painting, Furniture assembly, Moulding/Trim, Gutter repair and cleaning, Custom Carpentry, Flooring/Tile installation, Window treatments, Flashing, Fascia and soffit repair, Downspouts, Hardwood flooring, Bathroom renovations, Kitchen remodel, Handrails/Stairs, Backsplash installation
specialities: Bathrooms, Carpentry, Drywall Repair and general handyman services is where we specialize.
payment_method: Cash, Cheque, Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Email money transfer, Paypal, Company PO /w NET 30 terms
memberships: A+ Accredited business with the Better Business Bureau, member of Richmond Hill Chamber of Commerce
project_rate: We provide a written estimate before any job starts. Our jobs start at $198 + HST. (GST/HST No. 8020
project_minimum: No job is to small, we do it all!
name: Mr. Handyman Of Richmond Hill, Vaughan, And Markham

profile:
Whether you are undertaking a small home renovation or are in the planning phases of large-scale commercial development, Wolfsview Construction Inc. is here to better serve you.  We combine design to build and trades expertise, to excel at every stage of your project. 

Our qualified team of professionals is knowledgeable in all areas of construction â€“ residential, commercial, corporate and industrial. We ensure that our projects are handled by the most qualified professionals, to suit the specific needs of our clients. As a trusted General Contractor,  we maintain responsibility for the day-to-day oversight of the construction site, from start to finish.  Our administrative staff liaises in an organized fashion at the earliest phases of project management in order to connect you with skilled tradespeople you can rely on, to ensure optimal safety in the workplace and to guarantee satisfaction upon project completion.

We take pride in working cohesively with you throughout the course of a project, so that the client can step back and watch a renovation come together, stress-free! 

When clients put their trust in us,  we have one specific goal in mind: to provide cost-effective, labor-efficient construction solutions, with environmental and work safety obligations as the pillars of our day to day operations.
project_minimum: No job is too small or big

profile:
We are a home renovation, remodel, and handyman services company. 

With over a decade of experience, we offer quality workmanship and attention to detail that fits any budget. We pride ourselves on attention to detail and customization of work for each project we undertake. Whether your project is indoors, outdoors, a small fix or a large-scale renovation, we are able to meet your need. 

BATHROOMS
Whether you are looking for luxury finishes or something simple and functional, we've got you covered. 

FLOORING
Vinyl and laminate floors are on the rise, as they are durable, versatile, and come in a variety of attractive colours, shades and textures. We also install hardwood floors and tiles.

DECKS
Have us build you a new deck or simply refurbish your existing deck.

OUTDOOR WORK
Let us revitalize your outdoor space! Whether its a new shed, a rock garden, pavers, stone features, or mulch and sod installation, we've got you covered. 

STORAGE SOLUTIONS
We'll help you create more storage space so you can better utilize your cold room/cantina, basement, garage, and shed. We can also convert your extra bedroom into a large walk-in closet. 

GENERAL HANDYMAN REPAIRS & MAINTENANCE
Drywall repairs, painting, staining, electrical fixture replacements, trim carpentry installations, and other home repair needs.
